General.Name: Shanghai Originaldow Advanced
General.Description: Shenzhen Original Advanced Compounds Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of cable materials in the Mainland of China and internationally. The company provides polyolefin polymer materials for optical communication cables and other cables, as well as electrical equipment lines; and insulating polymer materials for power cables in power grid systems. Shenzhen Original Advanced Compounds Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 268, Beiheng Shahe Road, Shanghai, China, 201108
